tietosuojaseloste__jos_kayttajalle_on_me: If an order of non-disclosure for personal security reasons is valid for the user in the Population Information System, the Suomi.fi identification service will not process data to which the non-disclosure applies.
tietosuojaseloste__jos_tunnistustapahtum: If the identification event is rejected, information on the reason for the rejection is saved.
tietosuojaseloste__kansalaisen_tunnistus: Suomi.fi identification is the responsibility of the
tietosuojaseloste__lisaksi_rekisteriin_t: In addition, information generated when Suomi.fi identification is used is saved in the file.
tietosuojaseloste__lisaksi_tietoja_voida: In addition, information may be disclosed to parties responsible for maintaining e-services that use Suomi.fi identification in order to investigate faults in compliance with the requirements of the Data Protection Act. Information may also be disclosed as statistics or in some other format where individuals cannot be identified.
tietosuojaseloste__muuta_yksiloitya_tark: for other identified purpose where the person on whose service use information has been saved has given their express consent to this.

tietosuojaseloste__poliisi__esitutkinta_: police, pre-trial investigation and prosecuting authorities as well as a court of law for the purposes of preventing and investigating a crime;
tietosuojaseloste__rekisteri_on_suomifi_: The file is the event log file of the Suomi.fi identification service.
tietosuojaseloste__rekisterin_tallennett: The data saved in the file is used for the follow-up and monitoring of Suomi.fi identification service use, fault investigation and investigation of any abuses and data security violations. The event log data saved in the file is also used for statistical purposes.
tietosuojaseloste__rekisterin_tietolahte: The data sources of the file are:
tietosuojaseloste__rekisterinpitaja_ei_l: The controller does not transfer information to countries outside the EU or European Economic Area.
tietosuojaseloste__rekisterinpitaja_voi_: The controller may disclose data contained in the file to:
tietosuojaseloste__rekisteroidylla_ei_ol: The data subjects have no other rights related to the processing of personal data.
tietosuojaseloste__rekisteroidylla_on_om: Data subjects have the right of access to their own data. Access requests should be addressed in writing to the contact person of the file.
tietosuojaseloste__sahkopostiosoite_mika: e-mail address, if given by the user
tietosuojaseloste__selvitystilanteihin_l: Manual documentation associated with access to register data for the purpose of investigating faults is protected as required in legislation, taking the requirements of data security into account.
tietosuojaseloste__suomifi_tunnistamisen: the information entered and registered by the user on the electronic feedback forms of the Suomi.fi identification service
The data in the Suomi.fi identification event log file are protected as required by legislation, taking the requirements of data security into account.
tietosuojaseloste__tapahtumatietorekiste: Information is also saved in the event log file when a user provides feedback on the electronic feedback form in the Suomi.fi identification system. The feedback is sent to Public Service Info for processing. The following information is saved on feedback form use:
The following data on the use of Suomi.fi identification is saved in the event log file:
The data in the event log file can only be accessed by persons whose duties include processing such data.
tietosuojaseloste__tieto_mahdollisesta_t: information on any non-disclosure order for personal security reasons
tietosuojaseloste__tietosuojavaltuutetul: The Data Protection Ombudsman and the Data Protection Board for the purpose of supervising data security;
tietosuojaseloste__tunnistusta_pyytaneen: The unique identifier of the e-service that has requested identification
tietosuojaseloste__tunnistustapahtumaan_: Time and date stamps of the identification event
tietosuojaseloste__tunnistusvalineen_yks: The unique identifier of the identification method and the personal data retrieved by the identification method, which may include a name, an electronic service use ID and a telephone number.
